title: Dr Wathik Alsaud
sitename: Chelsea and Westminster Hospital NHS Foundation Trust
cleaned_text: Dr Wathik Alsaud Contact informationT: - Food Allergies and eczema - Paediatrics Oncology - Common Respiratory problems including Asthma - Acute and General Paediatrics Profile Dr Alsaud is an acute general paediatric consultant with special interest in children with multiple allergies and asthma. He is also part of the multidisciplinary team for paediatric oncology at Chelsea and Westminster Hospital and a member of British society of Allergy and clinical immunology. Qualifications FRCPCH, MBchB Memberships MDU,BMA,RCPCH and British Society for allergy and clinical immunology Spoken languages English, Arabic
